attributes.action: Let us Muslims at least get a 3 day holiday for Eid, a religious celebration.
attributes.additional_details: We want a longer holiday, 3 days at most. We fast for a whole entire month & we get only one day in return to celebrate our celebration. It is unfair how Christmas gets a longer holiday as well as Easter. Eid is just as important as any celebration/ event in any other religion. We deserve 3 days or more at most to celebrate our special days, as do other people on their special days such as Christmas.
attributes.background: Muslims fast for a month, during the month of Ramadan. We only get one day to celebrate Eid, whereas the other holidays get 2/3 weeks. For example, the Christmas holiday is 2/3 weeks long, Easter is 2 weeks long. Those are Christian holidays, we have no holidays of our own.

rejection.details:
We understand you would like increased holidays for Eid, however we're not sure if you mean school holidays or bank holidays.

You might like to sign this petition which calls for a related action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581489.
